thread.title: BRIEF-Boralex Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share Of $0.26

title: BRIEF-Boralex Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share Of $0.26
text:
May 9, 2018 / 11:06 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Boralex Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share Of $0.26 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 9 (Reuters) - Boralex Inc:
* BORALEX REPORTS CONTINUED GROWTH WITH IMPROVED RESULTS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018 AND INCREASES ITS DIVIDEND BY 5% * BORALEX INC QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.26
* BORALEX INC QTRLY REVENUES FROM ENERGY SALES OF $152 MILLION ($168 MILLION) IN Q1 OF 2018, UP 28%
* BORALEX INC - CORPORATIONâ€™S BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS AUTHORIZED AND DECLARED AND INCREASED QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.1575 PER COMMON SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
